name: Beatyouthere
overview: Beatyouthere is a free online real estate search engine and social networking platform.

milestones.description: BeatYouThere.com unveils Chit Chat blog platform and advanced user search
milestones.source_text:
New Blog Platform allows users to post their real estate and mortgage needs.

Stamford, CT  June 25, 2008  BeatYouThere.com, a free online real estate
search engine and social networking platform has introduced two new
interactive features to compliment their current social community.

Starting today, users can ask or answer questions on numerous real estate
related topics such as: home buying, home selling, local markets,
foreclosures, financing and investing.  Users can also post their real
estate wants by posting their criteria for a home they would like to
purchase, a place they need to rent or a type of mortgage they need
financed.  

Â³We wanted to build a blog platform that would be attractive to both the
user and the real estate professional.Â² Said Mark Langowski, CEO of
BeatYouThere.com.  Â³This is a free lead generation tool for agents and
mortgage professionals. The user benefits because they have industry
professionals fighting for their business.Â²

Â³Chit ChatÂ² Key Benefits for Consumers:
Â·      Have the ability to post your housing needs and have real estate
professionals compete for your business by providing you with exactly what
you asked for.  
Â·      Have banks, mortgage brokers and individual investors compete over
your mortgage needs.  Because all users must be registered, you will often
find more detailed business information on their profile.

Â³Chit ChatÂ² Key Benefits for Industry Professionals:
Â·      Post replies that are relevant to your industry or area and become
looked at as a local or national expert.
Â·      Meet the needs of consumer demands for Â³real estate wantedÂ² or
Â³financing neededÂ² and have the opportunity for obtaining a new client.


Advanced User Search:

BeatYouThere.comÂ¹s new user search makes it easy for consumers to quickly
find someone in their real estate directory.  Users can search by name,
location or user type. Users can search through BeatYouThere.comÂ¹s growing
database of real estate agents, homebuyers/sellers, banks, mortgage
professionals, private lenders and investors.



About BeatYouThere.com

BeatYouThere.com is a free online real estate search engine that provides
its users with over two million listings from all types of industry sources,
an easy to use interface and trusted social networking community. By using
BeatYouThere.com, users can confidently access the complete real estate
landscape to reduce their risk and increase their understanding of one of
the largest investments a person makes in their lifetime. BeatYouThere.com
is headquartered in Stamford, CT.

For more information, please visit www.BeatYouThere.com
<http://www.beatyouthere.com>
milestones.source_description: BeatYouThere.com unveils Chit Chat blog platform and advanced user search
